content: ear squish the two sides of head together so you have a straight line making sure your face is in the middle working through both sides of the work 4 loops complete the following in the first stitch *single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet* now slip_stitch over all of the middle stitches excluding the last in the last space put in the following three stitches - *single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet* close bind off and secure the thread leaving a long tail thread this tail through a few stitches to the middle of the head tie a knot in the top of the string to use for hanging optional give the cat a collar by crocheting 28-30 chains and tying around the neck you can use ribbon a bell or even a bow around the cat s neck as well another option is to sew or glue a small pompom on the end of the tail these cats are perfect to recolour for halloween cats too criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-kitty-cat criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-kitty-cat
